question.title: Pass attribute context to `CustomDepricationLogic` in @JsonInclude(value = JsonInclude.Include.CUSTOM, valueFilter = CustomDepricationLogic.class)
question.body:
@JsonInclude(value = JsonInclude.Include.CUSTOM, valueFilter = CustomDepricationLogic.class)
    private SomeClass attribute;

I want to annotate a field inside a class to run a deprecation logic to decide if the field should be returned in my json response or not. To make my CustomDepricationLogic.class scalable i want a way to pass the context of the attribute inside my class. By context of the attribute i mean the name of the attribute, name of the parent and so on. Using custom JsonSerializer for annotation does not remove the field completely. I am looking for a way to only annotate the field and not applying a global filter
